short_description: This function sends an API request to a machine learning model deployed on Sagemaker, using input data from a Teradata table. The model processes the data and returns predictions, which are then provided as the output of the function for users to consume.
long_description: This function sends an API request to a machine learning model deployed on Sagemaker, using input data from a Teradata table. The model processes the data and returns predictions, which are then provided as the output of the function for users to consume.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: Endpoint
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the Endpoint of the model deployed on Sagemaker.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the Endpoint of the model deployed on Sagemaker.

argument_clauses.name: Region
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the AWS Sagemaker service region.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the AWS Sagemaker service region.

argument_clauses.name: AccessKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the AWS Sagemaker service access key.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the AWS Sagemaker service access key.

argument_clauses.name: SecretKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the AWS Sagemaker service secret key.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the AWS Sagemaker service secret key.

argument_clauses.name: SessionKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the AWS Sagemaker service session key.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the AWS Sagemaker service session key.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to be sent to the model hosted on sagemaker for inference.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to be sent to the model hosted on sagemaker for inference.

argument_clauses.name: isDebug
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether error logging is required.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether error logging is required.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copy all input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copy all any input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: AUTHORIZATION
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the authorization object name containing the credentials, optionally prefixed by the database name.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the authorization object name containing the credentials, optionally prefixed by the database name.
